All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AvailableCourierNotFoundException
Exception thrown when no available courier is found for a delivery request.
BadArgumentTypeException
Exception class for handling errors related to factories.
BadDishTypeCreationException
Exception class for handling errors related to dish creation.
BadMealFormulaException
Exception class for handling errors related to meal creation.
BadMealTypeCreationException
Exception class for handling errors related to meal creation.
BadNumberOfArgumentsException
Exception class for handling errors related to factories.
BadOrderHandlingException
Exception class for handling errors related to order processing.
BadUserCreationException
Exception class for handling errors related to user creation.
BasicCard
Represents a basic fidelity card for a customer in the Foodora system.
BasicScenarioGenerator
Generates a basic scenario with a predefined set of users (customers, restaurants, couriers, manager) and associated data like menus and dishes for testing or demonstration purposes.
CLI
Command Line Interface (CLI) for interacting with the MyFoodora system.
Courier
Class representing a Courier in the system.
CourierComparator
Comparator class for comparing Courier objects based on their delivery counter.
CourierSorter
Class for sorting Courier objects based on their delivery counter.
Customer
Class representing a Customer in the MyFoodora system.
DeliveryStrategy
Interface defining the strategy for selecting a courier for a delivery.
Dessert
Class representing a dessert in the system.
Dish
Class representing a dish in the system.
DishComparator
Comparator implementation for Dish objects.
DishFactory
Factory class to create Dish objects of various types.
FairOccupationDelivery
Delivery strategy that selects the courier with the least number of deliveries who is currently on duty, promoting a fair distribution of workload among couriers.
FastestDelivery
Delivery strategy that selects the courier who can deliver the order fastest, based on the total distance from the courier to the restaurant plus the distance from the restaurant to the customer.
FidelityCard
Abstract class representing a fidelity card for a customer.
FidelityCardFactory
Factory class for creating different types of Fidelity Cards.
FidelityCardType
Enum representing different types of Fidelity Cards.
FormulaType
Enum contaning possible formulas of HalfMeal.
FullMeal
Represents a full meal in the system.
GeneralDiscountMeal
A pricing strategy that applies a general discount to the total price of a meal.
HalfMeal
Represents a half meal in the system.
IncorrectCredentialsException
Exception thrown when username and password do not match.
Location
Exception class for handling errors related to user creation.
LotteryCard
Class representing a LotteryCard, which is a type of FidelityCard.
MainDish
Represents a main dish in the system.
Manager
The Manager class represents a manager in the MyFoodora system.
Meal
Abstract class representing a meal in the system.
MealComparator
Comparator class to compare Meal objects based on their delivery frequency.
MealFactory
Factory class for creating Meal objects based on given parameters.
MealOfTheWeekDiscount
Pricing strategy implementing a discount for the "Meal of the Week".
Menu
 
MyFoodora
Singleton class representing the MyFoodora system, managing users, orders, profit strategies, and other key system functionalities.
NoDiscountMeal
Pricing strategy that applies no discount.
Observable
Observable interface for the Observer design pattern.
Observer
Observer interface for the Observer design pattern.
Order
The Order class represents an order in the MyFoodora system.
Person
The Person class represents a person in the MyFoodora system.
PointCard
Class representing a PointCard, which is a type of FidelityCard.
PricingMealStrategy
Interface for pricing strategies applied to meals.
ProfitData
Represents the profit data for the MyFedoora system.
ProfitStrategy
Interface defining the strategy for calculating profit data based on previous orders a target profit and a the policy.
Restaurant
Represents a Restaurant in the MyFoodora system.
RestaurantComparator
Comparator class for comparing two Restaurant objects based on their order counter.
RestaurantSorter
The RestaurantSorter class provides a method to sort a list of Restaurant objects based on their order counter.
Starter
Represents a Starter in the system.
TargetProfitDeliveryCostOriented
Implementation of ProfitStrategy focused on adjusting the delivery cost to achieve a target profit, considering markup percentage and service fee.
TargetProfitMarkupPercentageOriented
Implementation of ProfitStrategy focused on adjusting the markup percentage to achieve a target profit, considering delivery cost and service fee.
TargetProfitServiceFeeOriented
Implementation of ProfitStrategy focused on adjusting the service fee to achieve a target profit, considering markup percentage and delivery cost.
TestCourier
Test class for Courier class.
TestCustomer
Test class for Costumer class.
TestDish
Test class for the Dish class and its subclasses.
TestFidelityCards
Test class for FidelityCard classes.
TestLocation
Test class for Location class.
TestManager
Test class for Manager class.
TestMeal
Test class for the Meal class and its subclasses.
TestMenu
Test class for Menu.
TestOrder
Test class for Order class.
TestRestaurant
Test class for Restaurant class.
TestSystem
Test class for the MyFoodora system.
UnrecognizedDishException
Exception thrown when a Dish type is not recognized or supported.
User
The User class represents a user in the MyFoodora system.
UserFactory
Exception class for handling errors related to user creation.
UserNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a user is not found in the system.
